「Lin2 kiam2無講，iau2有四月日，就收割e5時到mah？我ka7 lin2講，kiah8目看園已經熟，thang割lah。」遠東歸主派阮ti7 東部13月日久e5傳道，hou7 我那同感主對學生所教示e5這幾句話。因為東部iau2濟濟兄姐 m7 bat去，koh東部e5山地教會，是第一發展，所以我就無想家己e5 ham-ban7，好膽giah8筆來寫「東部傳道見聞記」，報消息hou7關心東部教會e5兄姐知，續為著in來祈禱。

“Lin2 kiam2 bo5 kong2, iau2 u7 si3 geh8 jit8, chiu7 siu-koah e5 si5 kau3 mah? Goa2 ka7 lin2 kong2, kiah8-bak8 khoaN3 hng5 i2-keng sek8, thang koah lah.” Oan2-tong-kui-chu2 phai3 goan2 ti7 Tang-pou7 13 geh8 jit8 ku2 e5 thoan5-to7, hou7 goa2 na2 tong5-kam2 Chu2 tui3 hak8-seng sou2 ka3-si7 e5 chit kui2 ku3 oe7. In-ui7 Tang-pou7 iau2 choe7-choe7 hiaN-che2 m7 bat khi3, koh Tang-pou7 e5 san-te7 kau3-hoe7, si7 te7-it hoat-tian2, sou2-i2 goa2 chiu7 bo5 siuN7 ka-ki7 e5 ham-ban7, ho2-taN2 giah8 pit lai5 sia2 “Tang-pou7 thoan5-to7 kian3-bun5-ki3”, po3 siau-sit hou7 koan-sim Tang-pou7 kau3-hoe7 e5 hiaN-che2 chai, soa3 ui7 tioh8 in lai5 ki5-to2.

Ti7見聞記e5內面，有時有寫「阮」字，是teh指阮會nih8 e5同工，因為許Leng5-khu先生有kap我ti7太麻里、富里、東竹、大里、玉里頂教會同工，koh一位施Khiam-iok先生bat ti7 豐田、壽豐、新城、花蓮、慶豐，kap第二回e5太麻里頂教會，所以若讀阮e5時，咱會thang想著這兩位同工。設使咱讀了若會thang受鼓勵，日日為主做見證，就寫e5人已經達目的lah。願咱ti7主恩愛e5內面相勉勵，相替祈禱，將所chhun e5光陰來榮耀主，是心所願。

Ti7 kian3-bun5-ki3 e5 lai7-bin7, u7 si5 u7 sia2 “goan2” ji7, si7 teh chi2 goan2 hoe7--nih8 e5 tang5-kang, in-ui7 Khou2 Leng5-khu sian-siN u7 kap goa2 ti7 Thai3-moa5-li2, Hu3-li2, Tang-tek, Tai7-li2, Giok8-li2 teng2 kau3-hoe7 tang5-kang, koh chit8 ui7 Si Khiam-iok sian-siN bat ti7 Hong-tian5, Siu7-hong, Sin-siaN5, Hoa-lian5, Kheng3-hong, kap te7-ji7 hoe5 e5 Thai3-moa5-li2 teng2 kau3-hoe7, sou2-i2 na7 thak8 goan2 e5 si5, lan2 oe7 thang siuN7 tioh8 chit nng7 ui7 tang5-kang. Siat-su2 lan2 thak8 liau2 na7 oe7 thang siu7 kou2-le7, jit8-jit8 ui7 Chu2 cho3 kian3-cheng3, chiu7 sia2 e5 lang5 i2-keng tat8 bok8-tek lah. Goan7 lan2 ti7 Chu2 un-ai3 e5 lai7-bin7 saN bian2-le7, saN the3 ki5-to2, chiong sou2 chhun e5 kong-im lai5 eng5-iau7 Chu2, si7 sim sou2 goan7.

後山路真危險

逐擺若tui3高雄坐車beh去台東攏有聽見旅客teh談論後山路真危險。因為山路細條，若落雨koh會崩山，阻擋交通。Ti7 6月中只有2日久，就peng2 3隻貨物車，死3名，重傷幾若個，其中台東教會一位執事是司機，伊e5車peng2幾若lin3，落山坪，本身著重傷。Koh逐擺坐車e5時，會tu2著旅客眩車lok8-lok8吐。我本身也bat吐，總是往復坐25擺（一擺坐飛機）攏無覺得危險。後來有金馬號快車，實在坐了真舒服，總是著坐6點鐘左右，也是會厭sian7。

Tak8-pai2 na7 tui3 Ko-hiong5 che7 chhia beh khi3 Tai5-tang long2 u7 thiaN-kiN3 lu2-kheh teh tam5-lun7 au7-soaN lou7 chin gui5-hiam2. In-ui7 soaN-lou7 soe3-tiau5, na7 loh8-hou7 koh oe7 pang soaN, chou2-tong3 kau-thong. Ti7 6 geh8 tiong chi2 u7 2 jit8 ku2, chiu7 peng2 3 chiah hoe3-but8-chhia, si2 3 mia5, tang7-siong kui2-na7 e5, ki5-tiong Tai5-tang kau3-hoe7 chit8 ui7 chip-su7 si7 su-ki, i e5 chhia peng2 kui2-na7 lin3, loh8 soaN-phiaN5, pun2-sin tioh8 tang7-siong. Goa2 pun2-sin ia7 bat thou3, chong2-si7 ong2-hok8 che7 25 pai2 (chit8 pai2 che7 hui-ki) long2 bo5 kak-tit gui5-hiam2. Au7-lai5 u7 kim-ma2-ho7 khoai3-chhia, sit8-chai7 che7 liau2 chin su-hok8, chong2-si7 tioh8 che7 6 tiam2 cheng cho2-iu7, ia7 si7 oe7 ia3-sian7.
東部教會大本營
Tang-Pou7 Kau3-Hoe7 Tai7-Pun2-IaN5

台東教會tui3地理上，抑是交通上來看攏是真要緊e5所在，所以我稱伊做大本營。Ti7 13月日久e5東部傳道，攏tui3 chia出入，得著牧師，長執會友真親切e5招待。溫榮春牧師ti7 chia牧會成十年久，做人溫和，gau5協助同工，我得著伊全家e5愛顧真濟，m7 若an2-ni，常對我工作e5指導，替我買車票，鬥載行李，伊攏無嫌費氣，歡喜幫贊，應該著對in說謝，溫牧師實在是傳道人e5好模範。

Tai5-tang kau3-hoe7 tui3 te7-li2 siong7, a2 si7 kau-thong siong7 lai5 khoaN3 long2 si7 chin iau3-kin2 e5 sou2-chai7, sou2-i2 goa2 chheng i cho3 tai7-pun2-iaN5. Ti7 13 geh8-jit8 ku2 e5 Tang-pou7 thoan5-to7, long2 tui3 chia chhut jip8, tit tioh8 bok8-su, tiong2-chip hoe7-iu2 chin chhin-chhiat e5 chiau-thai7. Un Eng5-chhun bok8-su ti7 chia bok8-hoe7 chiaN5 chap8 ni5 ku2, cho3 lang5 un-ho5, gau5 hiap8-chou7 tang5-kang, goa2 tit tioh8 i choan5-ke e5 ai3-kou3 chin choe7, m7 na7 an2-ni, siong5 tui3 goa2 kang-chok e5 chi2-to7, thoe3 goa2 boe2 chhia-phio3, tau3 chai3 heng5-li2, i long2 bo5 hiam5 hui3-khi3, hoaN-hi2 pang-chan7, eng-kai tioh8 tui3 in seh-sia7, Un bok8-su sit8-chai7 si7 thoan5-to7-jin5 e5 ho2 bou5-hoan7.
後山塗真黏
Au7-SoaN Thou5 Chin Liam5

去東部e5人攏是ti7 西部tu2著生活發生困難，搬去e5較濟，卻也有e5是有錢，有地位e5人去hia做事業。不論是為甚物緣故去東部攏好，不過有一項，in去了就無想beh轉來西部，因為hia好趁食，土地闊，thang種作來維持生活；也有真濟兄弟，去hia趁著錢，生活富裕。我若問hia e5兄弟講，「Lin2有想beh koh轉來西部抑無？」In講，「想是會想，總是後山塗真黏，」意思是行boe7開腳，因為好趁食，thai2有影後山e5塗有黏leh？

Khi3 Tang-pou7 e5 lang5 long2 si7 ti7 Sai-pou7 tu2 tioh8 seng-oah8 hoat-seng khun3-lan5, poaN khi3 e5 khah choe7, khiok ia7 u7 e5 si7 u7 chiN5, u7 te7-ui7 e5 lang5 khi3 hia cho3 su7-giap8. Goa2 na7 mng7 hia e5 hiaN-ti7 kong2, “Lin2 u7 siuN7 beh koh tng2 lai5 Sai-pou7 a2-bo5?” In kong2, “SiuN7 si7 oe7 siuN7, chong2-si7 au7-soaN thou5 chin liam5,” i3-su3 si7 kiaN5 boe7 khui-kha, in-ui7 ho2 than3-chiah8, thai2 u7 iaN2 au7-soaN e5 thou5 u7 liam5 leh?

Ti7 5月中我去新港（成功鎮）教會做工，這間教會tui3台東著koh坐汽車，50外公里才會到。若講起新港教會，就想著教界e5老先輩高篤行牧師，伊光復後來新港設教會，後來有請林川明牧師來牧會。對in 2位kap兄姐e5努力，這間教會誠做一間東部有力e5教會，教會e5地點是東中第一好，所在安靜，對面有大海，行落kia-a2就有港口，真濟漁船ti7 hia出入，空氣koh好，實在是小天堂一樣。Chia e5魚真俗，鬼頭刀一公斤賣到1箍8角，我ti7 chia一禮拜久，食真濟XXX。諸位讀者，lin2若ai3食chhiN 魚，請你來新港。Ti7 chia有簡牧師teh開醫館，續幫贊山地教會e5工。

Ti7 5 geh8 tiong goa2 khi3 Sin-kang2 (成功鎮) kau3-hoe7 cho3 kang, chit keng kau3-hoe7 tui3 Tai5-tang tioh8 koh che7 khi3-chhia, 50 goa7 kong-li2 chiah oe7 kau3. Na7 kong2 khi2 Sin-kang2 kau3-hoe7, chiu7 siuN7 tioh8 kau3-kai3 e5 lau7 sian-poe3 Ko Tok-heng5 bok8-su, i kong-hok8 au7 lai5 Sin-kang2 siat kau3-hoe7, au7-lai5 u7 chhiaN2 Lim5 Chhoan-beng5 bok8-su lai5 bok8-hoe7. Tui3 in 2 ui7 kap hiaN-che2 e5 lou2-lek8, chit keng kau3-hoe7 chiaN5-cho3 chit8 keng Tang-pou7 u7 lat8 e5 kau3-hoe7, kau3-hoe7 e5 te7-tiam2 si7 Tang Tiong te7-it ho2, sou2-chai7 an-cheng7, tui3-bin7 u7 toa7-hai2, kiaN5 loh8 kia-a2 chiu7 u7 kang2-khau2, chin choe7 hi5-chun5 ti7 hia chhut-jip8, khong-khi3 koh ho2, sit8-chai7 si7 sio2 thian-tong5 chit8-iuN7. Chia e5 hi5 chin siok8, kui2-thau5-to chit8 kong-kin boe7 kau3 1 khou 8 kak, goa2 ti7 chia chit8 le2-pai3 ku2, chiah8 chin choe7 XXX. Chu-ui7 thok8-chia2, lin2 na7 ai3 chiah8 chhiN-hi5, chhiaN2 li2 lai5 Sin-kang2. Ti7 chia u7 Kan2 bok8-su teh khui i-koan2, soa3 pang-chan7 san-te7 kau3-hoe7 e5 kang.
我無口才

Tui3新港koh去20公里e5所在，有一間竹湖教會，開設2年外久，做禮拜有4、5十人，信徒攏是tui3別位搬來e5，特別有埔里方面e5兄弟，幾若位ti7 這間教會teh活動。這間教會起ti7大路邊，頭前向太平洋，後面有山，若企ti7 台頂講道，有看著大海，有時也會聽著海湧hoa7-hoa7哮e5聲，親像看著一幅會出聲e5圖畫。

Tui3 Sin-kang2 koh khi3 20 kong-li2 e5 sou2-chai7, u7 chit8 keng Tek-ou5 kau3-hoe7, khai-siat 2 ni5 goa7 ku2, cho3 le2-pai3 u7 4, 5 chap8 lang5, sin3-tou5 long2 si7 tui3 pat8-ui7 poaN lai5 e5, tek8-piat8 u7 Pou-li2 hong-bin7 e5 hiaN-ti7, kui2-na7 ui7 ti7 chit keng kau3-hoe7 teh oah8-tang7. Chit keng kau3-hoe7 khi2 ti7 toa7-lou7-piN, thau5-cheng5 ng3 Thai3-peng5-iuN5, au7-bin7 u7 soaN, na7 khia7 ti7 tai5-teng2 kang2-to7, u7 khoaN3 tioh8 toa7-hai2, u7 si5 ia7 oe7 thiaN tioh8 hai2-eng2 hoa7-hoa7 hau2 e5 siaN, chhin-chhiuN7 khoaN3 tioh8 chit8 pak oe7 chhut-siaN e5 tou5-ui7.
這間教會開設以來攏無長期駐在e5工人，in真ai3一位先生，總是倩攏無，若是長執真協力做主e5工，會友四散ti7 山頂企起，來到教會著行2點鐘e5路，若是in一禮拜久往來行無sian7。

Chit keng kau3-hoe7 khai-siat i2-lai5 long2 bo5 tng5-ki5 chu7-chai7 e5 kang-lang5, in chin ai3 chit8 ui7 sian-siN, chong2-si7 chhiaN3 long2 bo5, na7 si7 tiong2-chip chin hiap8-lek8 cho3 Chu2 e5 kang, hoe7-iu2 si3-soaN3 ti7 soaN-teng2 khia7-khi2, lai5 kau3 kau3-hoe7 tioh8 kiaN5 2 tiam2 cheng e5 lou7, na7 si7 in chit8 le2-pai3 ku2 ong2-lai5 kiaN5 bo5 sian7.

Ti7 3暗佈道會，in ai3我去長濱佈道，chia離竹湖8公里，是鄉所在地，ti7 東海岸第2鬧熱e5所在，hia e5民眾真ai3聽佈道，逐暗有3、4百人來聽，有村長，抑是鄉代表，專工tui3庄腳來聽，我佈道了in iau2 m7 散，村長要求講，請繼續來阮e5村中傳道，場所kap叫人我負責，可惜我無工thang去，真扑損。Hia e5民眾問講，「阮chia那 m7 設教會？」Hou7我boe7曉應答。竹湖e5長執真關心這所在，可惜in e5經濟力量有限，工人koh較是大問題，若 m7 是中會去開拓，實在有困難。主講，「Thang收成e5是濟，做工e5人少。」真有影。

Ti7 3 am3 pou3-to7-hoe7, in ai3 goa2 khi3 Tiong5-pin pou3-to7, chia li7 Tek-ou5 8 kong-li2, si7 hiong sou2-chai7 toe7, ti7 tang-hai2-gan7 te7 2 lau7-jiat8 e5 sou2-chai7, hia e5 bin5-chiong3 chin ai3 thiaN pou3-to7, tak8-am3 u7 3, 4 pah lang5 lai5 thiaN, u7 chhoan-tiuN2, a2 si7 hiong tai7-piau2, choan-kang tui3 chng-kha lai5 thiaN, goa2 pou3-to7 liau2 in iau2 m7 soaN3, chhoan-tiuN2 iau-kiu5 kong2, chhiaN2 ke3-siok8 lai5 goan2 e5 chhoan tiong thoan5-to7, tiuN5-sou2 kap kio3 lang5 goa2 hu7-chek, kho2-sioh goa2 bo5 kang thang khi3, chin phah-sng2. Hia e5 bin5-chiong3 mng7 kong2, “goan2 chia na2 m7 siat kau3-hoe7?” Hou7 goa2 boe7 hiau2 in3-tap. Tek-ou5 e5 tiong2-chip chin koan-sim chit sou2-chai7, kho2-sioh in e5 keng-che3 lek8-liong7 iu2-han7, kang-lang5 koh khah si7 toa7 bun7-te5, na7 m7 si7 Tiong-hoe7 khi3 khai-thok, sit8-chai7 u7 khun3-lan5. Chu2 kong2, “Thang siu-seng5 e5 si7 choe7, cho3 kang e5 lang5 chio2.” Chin u7 iaN2.
尼姑變做女傳道
